Articles.Content:
This has been in the recent news section on the steam library page for KSP for almost two months now (so some of you may have seen it already) and I just clicked the link to see what it was and it actually looks quite interesting. Basically it randomly picks a body and a challenge (sometimes more than one) to do there.

[Challenge Generator](http://www.scenariogenerator.net/game/kerbal_space_program)

I checked that out a while ago, and can't help but think... aren't those basically unpaid contracts?

It's cool and all, but it doesn't really add anything in my mind.
i like it i think it helps you if your a bit lost for what to do.But it needs more unique challenges e.g glide 5000 meters without using any engines or get to the highest mountain on kerbin
